thread.title_full: WYSE Travel Confederation joins the UNWTO Affiliate Board as global youth travel numbers increaseTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: WYSE Travel Confederation joins the UNWTO Affiliate Board as global youth travel numbers increaseTravelandtourworld.com
text:
WYSE Travel Confederation joins the UNWTO Affiliate Board as global youth travel numbers increase
Youth travel is growing year on year, faster than traditional tourism and WYSE Travel Confederation is proud to be the voice of this thriving travel and tourism sector on the UNWTO Affiliates Board.
WYSE Travel Confederation Director General David Chapman said; “Our accession to the Affiliate Members Board is of great importance for the global youth, student and educational travel industry as a whole, and what better time for us to be re-elected than during this prosperous stage in the growth of youth travel? The sector has powerful potential to contribute to responsible and sustainable tourism goals, as well as foster cultural understanding and we, as its representatives, intend to bring the voice of youth travel back to the table. We are very excited to be helping other stakeholders harness the power of youth travel.”
Source:-UNWTO
